channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- KIWIZ Invoices Certification & PDF System
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- KIWIZ Invoices Certification & PDF System

item.title: CVE-2023-2180|2024-08-02T06:12:20.511Z -- unknown -- kiwiz%20invoices%20certification%20%26%20pdf%20system
item.description: The KIWIZ Invoices Certification & PDF System WordPress plugin through 2.1.3 does not validate the path of files to be downloaded, which could allow unauthenticated attacker to read/downlaod arbitrary files, as well as perform PHAR unserialization (assuming they can upload a file on the server)
